keyword: calories in in n out fries
title: Calories in In-N-Out Fries
meta_description: Discover calories in in n out fries for a regular order, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and easy tweaks for your meal.
assumptions: Regular order of fresh-cut french fries, cooked in 100% vegetable oil (cholesterol-free, trans-fat-free); no added toppings or sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, cooking oil batch, and customizations; check In-N-Out's official nutrition info or app for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A regular order of In-N-Out fries contains about 395 calories and 6 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Animal-style fries (with cheese, grilled onions, spread)

faqs.q: How many calories in in n out fries regular order?
faqs.a: About 395 calories for one regular order.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in In-N-Out fries?
faqs.a: Approximately 54 g carbs, including 5 g fiber, per regular order.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out fries high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 245 mg sodium per regular order.

faqs.q: Do In-N-Out fries have trans fats?
faqs.a: No trans fats (0 g), cooked in cholesterol-free vegetable oil.

faqs.q: How do cheese fries change the calories?
faqs.a: Adding cheese increases calories by about 170, for a total of 565 kcal.
